title: Downtown Delights
description: Glittering venues. Bad dancing. Scary exes. Hook-up bets. Accidental flirting. Mysterious hotties. Electric romance. All in an eveningâ€™s play for the Inamorata girls!  Lesbian besties Reagan, Charlie, Ginger and Lucy are out on the town and ready for action in Downtown Delights.  Join them in their fun as they light up the Dallas night!  Book One in Vivian Sage's quarterly Inamorata Novella series.
author: Vivian Sage
